loader.query: select e from enty_UsrNodeFinTxact e order by e.sortKey, e.id2
select e from enty_UsrNodeFinTxactItm e where e.id2 is null order by e.sortKey, e.id2

tagField.query: select e from enty_UsrItemGenTag e where lower(e.id2) like lower(:searchString) escape '\'
select e from enty_UsrItemGenTag e where lower(e.id2) like lower(:searchString) escape '\'
